channel.title: How do i make npcs' talk quicker?

item.title: How do i make npcs' talk quicker?

item.description:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 757) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "welcome to alzscape admin island muhahahaha";
